title: Walmart takes on Prime Day with its Deals for Day sale – TVs, AirPods, and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Prime Day prices on TVs, AirPods, laptops, and more
article: Walmart is taking on Amazon with its very own rival Prime Day sale. The retail giant launched its Deal for Days sale yesterday with incredible bargains across the site, including everything from TVs, laptops, and AirPods, to the Instant Pot, vacuums, air fryers, and so much more. The best part about Walmart's sale is you get free next-day delivery for orders over $35 on thousands of eligible items, and unlike Amazon Prime Day, Walmart doesn't require a paid membership – these deals are for everyone.

We've combed through today's sale and picked the best Walmart deals below. Among the best bargains we've spotted are the best-selling Apple Watch 3 on sale for $169 (was $199), an ultra-cheap Gateway laptop marked down to $419 (was $749), and the Hisense 40-inch Roku TV on sale for just $178. We also have Prime Day-beating appliance deals like the best-selling Instant Pot Viva on sale at an all-time low price of $59 (was $99), a massive $300 discount on the iHome robot vacuum and mop, and the Chefman air fryer marked down to just $69 (was $99). Browse the best of Walmart's Deals for Days sale below – and make sure to bookmark this page, as we'll be continuously updating it with all the top deals from Walmart throughout Amazon Prime Day and beyond.

If you're interested in more offers you can see our guide to the best Prime Day TV deals as well as the best Prime Day laptop deals. You can also see the best 4th of July sales from Best Buy, Home Depot, Lowe's and more.
